this_title: The Dog Star Man Has A Too Big Flaming Cock For The Sheba Queen
introduction: Always the same imperative: use a small amount of material. Which can be refilmed. Destruction of the photogram, loss in thickness. Mechanical wear, tearing. Emergence of organic buried under a mineral veil. Figurative push.
